summary:
Implement IDS/IPS systems to monitor and protect networks. Learn about signature-based and anomaly-based detection.  Understand how to configure IDS/IPS rules and respond to security alerts. The lesson includes detailed explanations, visual aids, and assessment tools to ensure mastery of the concepts.

This topic provides essential knowledge for understanding cybersecurity at the Secondary level. Through comprehensive study, students will develop a deep understanding of the concepts, principles, and applications related to Intrusion Detection and Prevention. The material is designed to build a strong foundation for further learning and practical application in real-world contexts. This topic provides comprehensive coverage essential for understanding cybersecurity at the intermediate level. Through detailed study, students will gain deep insights into the concepts, principles, and real-world applications. The material is designed to build a strong foundation for further learning and practical application in various contexts.
why_it_matters: This programming/technology topic provides practical skills highly sought after in the job market and enables you to build real-world applications and solve technical problems.
